articles.description: A growing number of Americans want to get the coronavirus vaccine, and a majority also support workplace, lifestyle and travel restrictions for those not inoculated against COVID-19, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Friday.
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - A growing number of Americans want to get the coronavirus vaccine, and a majority also support workplace, lifestyle and travel restrictions for those not inoculated against COVID… [+3135 chars]

articles.author: Sam Shead
articles.title: Japanese tech giant Rakuten to raise $2.2 billion by issuing new shares to Walmart, Tencent and Japan Post - CNBC
articles.description: Japanese tech giant Rakuten is planning to raise $2.2 billion from a host of big names to help it compete with its U.S. rivals.
articles.content:
Japanese tech giant Rakuten is planning to raise $2.2 billion to help it compete with its U.S. rivals.
